prompt: A whimsical galactic location, known as Nebula Gardens, depicting a serene and colorful space garden. Featuring vibrant nebula clouds in shades of purple and blue, with large, radiant flowers blooming in the cosmic environment. Small, whimsical space creatures flit about, leaving trails of stardust. Glowing, floating islands and delicate, fluttering star butterflies enhance the fantastical atmosphere. The background showcases distant, twinkling stars and planets, adding to the charming and enchanting scene.
